ygData.subject: Re: Surrounded unknown bot
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: As PolarClaw said, please take nothing personnal in this! It s Azure, not me! AzureBlade: Don t you call me that way! Maybe he was a danger, but we did

OOC: As PolarClaw said, please take nothing personnal in this! It's 
Azure, not me!

AzureBlade: Don't you call me that way! Maybe he was a danger, but we 
did not have to get him to stasis lock. We should have had restrained 
him. I backed off because when I get too into a battle, I become 
berserk. In the it has ended with the death of a decepticon, but also 
that of my commanding officer. That is why I am on this planet right 
now. I AM PROTOFORM Z, THE BROTHER OF PROTOFORM X! I AM A TRUE MAXIMAL 
BUT I CAN NOT CONTROL MYSELF IN A BATTLE!

This outburst of anger made him shake wildly. He fell to the ground. 
He sobbed weakly. His shoulders came down and it was obvious he was 
mentally beaten.

AzureBlade: We did not have to kill him that much... It... is 
pathetic, right? I am a warrior, but I do not want to kill... The 
dragon is not resolved to kill the intruders... Can you even trust me?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Starcasm6@a... wrote:
> goth: YOU KNOW WHAT? FINE! HE WAS GOING TO SLAG US ALL, BUT YOU 
DIDN'T SEE 
> THAT, DID YOU? OH NO! HE HAD ALREADY STABBED YOU, BUT IT'S OKAY! 
BECAUSE 
> WE'RE BETTER THAN HIM! WE DON'T HAVE TO PROTECT OURSELVES!
>  goth turns away, unable to seak through his anger.
> ghost: Look, I realize that was a bit impulsive, but goth has a 
point. 
> whether you want to admit it or not, that thing is a menace and you 
weren't 
> exactly doing your job, mr. " righteous indignation."
